Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute near California/Belmont
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

Northbound buses will operate via California, Addison, Rockwell, then will wait recovery time.

Southbound buses will operate via Addison, Western, Belmont, then resume their normal route on California

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
